'''Equitable Judgment''' is an [[Character Card Normal Attack|Normal Attack]] for [[Neuvillette (Character Card)|Neuvillette]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

This skill is executed automatically 1 turn after using [[As Water Seeks Equilibrium (Character Card Skill)|As Water Seeks Equilibrium]] with a Sourcewater Droplet.
